scripts.app-ios-test-bs: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.ios.bs.app.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression "@Ios and not @Skip_For_Ios"
scripts.app-ios-test-local: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.ios.app.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression "@Ios and not @Skip_For_Ios"
scripts.app-android-test-bs: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.android.bs.app.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Android'
scripts.app-android-test-bs-smoke: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.android.bs.app.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Android and @Smoke'
scripts.app-android-test-local: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.android.app.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Android'
scripts.app-android-test-local-spec: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.android.app.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Android' --spec test/features/drawsPage/AppDrawsPage.feature
scripts.web-test-local: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.web.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Web and not @Live'
scripts.web-test-bs: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.web.bs.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Web and not @Live'
scripts.web-test-bs-smoke: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.web.bs.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Smokeand not @Live'
scripts.web-test-local-spec: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.web.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Web' --spec test/features/ticketInfo/WebWhatsOn.feature
scripts.web-test-local-smoke: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.web.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@Smoke and not @Live'
scripts.debug: yarn clear-dir && yarn lint && npx wdio config/wdio.ios.bs.app.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression "@debug"
